subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|肉|空|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=meat; flesh|t2=empty; hollow}}. Also an {{liushu|ic|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=qiāng,er=y
|m-s=qiang1
|c=hong1
|md=kiŏng
|mn=xm,qz,tp,kh,lk,sx,yl,km,mg,hc,tc:khiuⁿ/zz,tn:khioⁿ/pn:khiauⁿ/xm,qz,tw:khiong/zz:khiang/khang
|mn_note=khiuⁿ/khioⁿ/khiauⁿ - vernacular; khiong/khiang, khang - literary
|mn-t=kiên1/kion1
|mn-t_note=kiên1 - Chaozhou; kion1 - Shantou
|w=1qian
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}
